channel.title: Portforwarding [PI]
channel.description:
So yea... i can't portforward my PI galkon's client :/ I tryed with normal router portforwarding and uTorrent one. I aleready checked my client and source connect at same port! And when i change the IP in the client sided client.java i get this: [img]http://shrani.si/f/3K/FU/2qrpiT16/error.png[/img]
I followded houndreds of tutorials on portforwarding but none of them work :( I know there is not an eception in cleint or source because when i connect with 127.0.0.1 it works fine!

item.title: Portforwarding [PI]
item.dc:creator: @surer123 surer123
item.description:
@surer123 wrote:

Thanks Where can i change the IP the players will connect to?

EDIT: Coded it myself But thank you very much! <3

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Arcik:

Only you can connect on 127.0.0.1 and your players can connect on your IP address. So if you try to type your real IP in and connect on localhost you won’t be able too.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding [PI]
